Lao Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Book and Photo Exhibition and Film Show for Foreign Students Held 
    Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A book and photo exhibition and film show for foreign students studying at Kim Hyong Jik University of Education took place at the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on November 30 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 87th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
 The students looked round with keen interest photos showing the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.    
 After seeing famous works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books dealing with politics, economy, culture and history of Korea, they watched the Korean feature film "Footprint Marked with Blood."

Kim Yong Nam Greets Romanian President 
    Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ion Iliescu, president of Romania, today on the occasion of its national day.  The message wished the Romanian people progress, property and well-being.

articles.title: Greetings to Lao President
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. and IAEA's Double Standards
articles.content:
Greetings to Lao President 
    Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Lao President Khamtay Siphandone on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the foundation of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
 The message noted that over the last 29 years the Lao people have achieved great successes in defending the country and the cause of construction by displaying patriotism and the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the correct guidance of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. 
 Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in line with the desire and interests of the two peoples, the message wished the fraternal Lao people greater success in their work to implement the decision of the 7th Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party under its leadership.

articles.title: Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
Greetings to Romanian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Lao Prime Minister Boungnang Vorachit on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
 The message expressed the belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms and wished the prime minister great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.    
 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Somsavath Lengsavath, Lao deputy prime minister who doubles as foreign minister.

articles.content:
Greetings to Romanian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greetings to Romanian Prime Minister Adrian Nastase on the occasion of the national day of Romania.
 The message wished the prime minister and the Romanian people greater success in their efforts for the economic development of the country.    
 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Romanian counterpart Mircea Dan Geoana.
